label: GNOME developement tools
description: Everything you need to start developing software for GNOME.

exec.label: Install
exec.command: run-as-root dnf -y install @development-libs @development-tools @gnome-software-development @rpm-development-tools bzr bzrtools createrepo fedora-packager rpm-sign rpmdevtools vala vala-devel vala-tools vala-doc

undo.label: Remove
undo.command: run-as-root dnf -y --setopt clean_requirements_on_remove=1 erase @development-libs @development-tools @gnome-software-development @rpm-development-tools bzr bzrtools createrepo fedora-packager rpm-sign rpmdevtools vala vala-devel vala-tools vala-doc

status.command: rpm --quiet --query boost-devel bzip2-devel clutter-devel cvs cyrus-sasl-devel devhelp diffstat doxygen fedora-packager rpm-sign rpmdevtools gdb gettext git gnome-common gobject-introspection koji krb5-devel mock ncurses-devel openldap-devel pam-devel patchutils perl-devel python-devel python-ldap rcs readline-devel redhat-rpm-config rpmdevtools slang-devel subversion systemtap zlib-devel
